title: Connection issues since patch 6.9
body:
Hi!
I've been having quite annoying connection problems since the latest patch 6.9.

1. The chat keeps disconnecting and I'm having problems reconnecting to it most of the time.

2. When I'm about to get into a game and supposed to get the loading screen I instead get a message that the server didn't respond and I need to retry. At first this could be "fixed" by just waiting until people in my game had loaded their game and I could get in afterwards. But now I can't get into the game at all.

I've reinstalled LoL and closed down all other programs I could think of that's been running during but it doesn't help. Anyone else that experiences this since the latest patch or am I alone?

replies.body: yup ive had bad packet loss allll weekend long

Please follow the steps (if there are any you haven't completed) on the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your connection is set up properly.

You can view your connection by running a traceroute, and sharing the results might show us where it's going wrong. Please download the [WinMTR Network Diagnostic Tool](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/), then use that to run a traceroute to the following IP (allow this to run for 5-15 minutes);

> 104.160.131.1

Please 'copy text to clipboard' and paste it here.
Have this problem since the latest patch . Not sure what to do and im pretty sure its not the ISP's fault

I actually got a tip that help me out!

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AggE5gwoQmE

Don't know how this helped since I have my firewall off but hey, whatever works  ;P

In a general sense, the video is on the right track.  Getting disconnected from chat and not being able to enter a game after Champ Select all seem to point to some sort of weird connection issue.  Your computer is consistently trying to connect to our Chat servers or to the individual Game Server, but is blocked from doing so (hence the error).  

Sometimes this can be a result of Firewalls being turned off, but still active in the background or a variety of other settings.  It's always best to complete the steps in our [Connection Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  While there are a lot of steps there, they are the most common solutions to this kind of issue.

Funny thing is that it started May 8th. I've played this game in the same house since back in 2009 and never had this kind of issue unless it was the servers fault.

It's also very random. While it fails more than it succeeds i still sometimes can connect to a game and sometimes i can log in via the launcher.
I had that a month or two ago.  any first game of the day wouldn't load until the second or third reconnect, but then it sorted itself out after a week.
Having same problems can't log in.
Same problem here. I've tried everything but i can't get a game to work.
